thread.title: A very satisfied first time customer
thread.title_full: Survival-Pax.com reviewed by A very satisfied first time customer

author: A very satisfied first time customer
title: A very satisfied first time customer
text: I was contacted directly via phone by customer service to clear up some confusion that I had created regarding my address. The package was handled, shipped faster than I expected. Great business!
